sentences.en: A large, soft tomato , unerringly aimed , stuck the chairman in the face.
sentences.cn: 一只又大又烂的西红柿, 不偏不倚地正好打在董事长的脸上.

sentences.en: An unerringly professional team greet and treat clients.
sentences.cn: 完美的职业团队迎接并善待客户。

sentences.en: It was wonderful to watch her fingers moving deftly and unerringly.
sentences.cn: 观看她的手指灵巧而又准确无误地移动是一件美事。

sentences.en: She had seized unerringly on the fact that most disturbed him.
sentences.cn: 她很准确地抓住了令他苦恼不已的事由。

sentences.en: The 7 m - high Okere Falls drew us unerringly onward.
sentences.cn: 落差7米的奥克耳瀑布把我们准确地向它拖了过去.

sentences.en: The bell captain, Herbie Chandler, was firmly and unerringly impaled.
sentences.cn: 侍者领班赫比·钱德勒被又稳、又准地抓住了.

sentences.en: They are, however, unerringly perceptive of trusting relationships with professionals.
sentences.cn: 但他们却是, 准确无误地知觉与专业人士的信任关系.

sentences.en: They knew unerringly what to aspire to.
sentences.cn: 他们完全明白应追求什么.

sentences.en: We described how the golden plover manages to fly over thousands of miles of uncharted water each year directly and unerringly to Hawaii.
sentences.cn: 我们叙述金睢鸠（或黄千鸟）如何于每年飞过数千哩毫无标帜的汪洋大海，直接而无误地飞抵夏威夷。

sentences.en: You unerringly manage to pick the wrong people and the wrong things. "
sentences.cn: 因为你总是喜欢那些不该喜欢的人,不该喜欢的事.

words.tran_cn: 无过失的；不犯错误的；没有打歪的
